A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rogue One was MUCH better. There is some action but the mood was dark and somber\, the pace was slow and it was shot so dark that in 3D\, where most theaters don't properly turn up the brightness\, I couldn't see half the movie. Very disappointed. If it wasn't a Star Wars movie\, I probably would have given it one more star just for scope and some fun action scenes\, but the direction just seemed amateurish\, some scenes and lines were just corny. I think critics liked the seriousness and drama like they always do\, but the FUN that is part of the Star Wars legacy is missing.
